QuestData.Title: It's Never Over
QuestData.Description: Those Blackrock orcs are gonna need an army to handle the Bravo Company and you, $n. When you're ready to go, meet us at the dock facing Lake Everstill and we'll set off on my riverboat for Camp Everstill on the other side of the lake.$B$BSee you there, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Keeshan's Riverboat to Camp Everstill in Redridge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with John J. Keeshan at Camp Everstill in Redridge.
